description: This file contains the implementation of the Duel templating engine, including functions for type checking, HTML escaping, DOM manipulation, event handling, and rendering views for a TodoMVC application. It also includes local storage management for tasks.

methods.name: viewData
methods.description: Retrieves tasks and stats data based on filter (all, active, completed) from local storage.

methods.name: add
methods.description: Adds a new task with a unique ID, title, and default incomplete status to local storage.

methods.name: edit
methods.description: Edits the title of an existing task identified by ID.

methods.name: toggle
methods.description: Toggles the completion status of a task identified by ID.

methods.name: toggleAll
methods.description: Sets all tasks to completed or active.
